item.title: CS131-lecture-20200915
item.description: Annoucements # First quiz at the end of next week, covers the first 4 weeks. It’ll be open over the weekend. Use case homework has been published. Going to hold off on discussion on the 737 MAX HW until case study is finished. Team survey is open! Software requirements # How do you translate all of the elicited data into requirements? In-Class_and_HW_Activity 3_Use Case Description.pdf Business Use Case Name: International flight check-in
